channel.title: MIDI on Christopher Hamby
channel.description: Recent content in MIDI on Christopher Hamby

item.title: MIDI LED Strip
item.description: Introduction Everybody loves RGB LEDs. There isn’t a single thing that couldn’t benefit from having more LEDS. I remember watching a tv show as a child where a guitar player had LED lights on their amplifier that reacted to the music. That idea stuck with me, and when I first got a synthesizer I decided to try accomplishing something similar. I wanted something colorful and fully customizable, that could be programmed to react to music.
